message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own it, and I'm willing to start with a price of $12,000. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $11,000. Let me know if that's more to your liking!
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $11,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $9,500. Let's see if we can make this work.

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to compromise further, so I'm counteroffering at $10,500. This is my final offer for now, but I'm open to negotiations if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further.  $10,500 is getting closer, but I'm still hoping for a bit lower.  I'm willing to go up to $9,800.  Let's see if we can finalize this deal.

Hi Bob, I'm glad we're getting close to a deal. However, I'm still a bit above your offer of $9,800. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $10,300. Let's see if we can shake on it!
Alice, we're getting really close now.  I'm willing to go up to $10,000.  I'm hoping we can close this deal at that price.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $10,000. I'm willing to meet you at the price you mentioned, but I'm going to add a small premium for the effort we've put into negotiating. I'm counteroffering at $10,200. Let's see if we can finalize this deal!
